title: "Amazon Analysis"
output: html_notebook
---

From https://www.wsj.com/market-data/quotes/AMZN/financials/annual/income-statement

```{r}
year <- c(2018, 2019, 2020, 2021, 2022)
sales <- c(232887, 280522, 386064, 469822, 513983)
sales <- signif(sales/1000, digits = 3)
begin_sales <- sales[1:length(sales)-1]
names(sales) <- year
growth <- growth
percent_growth <- signif(growth / begin_sales, digits = 3)
agr <- mean(percent_growth)

print(percent_growth)
barplot(sales)
barplot(growth)
print(agr)
```
